summary: PROBLEMS WITH TEMPERATURES IN VEHICLE PASSENGER COMPARTMENT/ WINDSHIELD FOGS UP.   MR  THE CONSUMER STATED TENDS TO GET STUCK IN HOT OR COLD ONLY MODE AND THE CONDITION CAN NOT BE CURED VIA THE CLIMATE CONTROL SWITCHES.  IT SEEMED THAT A PART INSIDE OF THE DASH BREAKS FREQUENTLY AND WHEN IT DOES BREAK THE VEHICLE CAN NOT BE CHANGED THE OPPOSITE TEMPERATURE SETTING. ( THE CONSUMER STATE WHICH YEAR OF THE MARK VIII HE OWNED, HE TALKED ABOUT THE 97 AND 98 MODELS). *JB
